about.description:
batoms_api is a API for Beautiful Atoms package. Beautiful Atoms is
a Python package for editing and rendering atoms and molecules
objects using blender. A Python interface that allows for automating
workflows.
about.summary: Blendase is a Python package for drawing and rendering atoms, molecules and crystal using blender.

about.description:
batoms_api is a API for Beautiful Atoms package. Beautiful Atoms is
a Python package for editing and rendering atoms and molecules
objects using blender. A Python interface that allows for automating
workflows.
about.summary: Blendase is a Python package for drawing and rendering atoms, molecules and crystal using blender.

name: batoms-api

new_version_errors.0.2.0:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '0.2.0' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/batoms_api-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "batoms-api" %}
{% set version = "0.1.4" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/batoms_api-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e6b44f09cedcb1a6d468a137d5c2ded42b27997924b1c280d69ccffbe31f8795

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - batoms=batoms_api.cli.main:main
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.7
  run:
    - python >=3.7
    - ase

test:
  imports:
    - batoms_api
    - batoms_api.cli
  commands:
    - pip check
    - batoms --help
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/superstar54/beautiful-atoms-api
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Blendase is a Python package for drawing and rendering atoms, molecules and crystal using blender.'
  description: |
    batoms_api is a API for Beautiful Atoms package. Beautiful Atoms is
    a Python package for editing and rendering atoms and molecules
    objects using blender. A Python interface that allows for automating
    workflows.
  doc_url: https://github.com/superstar54/beautiful-atoms-api
  dev_url: https://github.com/superstar54/beautiful-atoms-api

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
